title: Advice to a Prophet - the speaker is asserting

content.prompt: In lines 13–16 (“Though . . . alters”), the speaker is asserting that we

choices.label: learn about nature according to our individual points of view
are always instructed by an altering of our perspective
realize that the end of the world may be near

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
